Lassina Abdoul Karim Konaté (amụrụ ya na 20 Mee 1987), nke a maara dị ka Karim Lancina, bụ onye Nijeria bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ. Ọ na-egwuri egwu ma ọ bụ dị ka onye na-agba bọọlụ n'etiti ma ọ bụ dịka onye na-azụ aka ekpe.
Na 29 Machị 2013, Lancina hapụrụ Cotonsport Garoua site na Cameroon wee bịanye aka na Bulgaria A Grupa side PFC Lokomotiv Sofia.
Lancina bụkwa onye otu mba Niger na-eme egwuregwu nke iri ise otu goolu
A kpọrọ ya na 2012 na 2012 Africa Cup of Nations
